meanings: (formal) fidelity (to), loyalty (to/towards), allegiance (to), be loyal (to), be devoted (to)

vlive.korean: 충성심이 마구마구 솟아난다! They turning me into such a loyal fan! 듣기 View video V Special : [V CREW] 붐보의 서재 - EP. 05 빅톤 미니앨범 5집 언박싱! (존버는 승.리.한.다🤭💓)
